Welcome to Beautiful Zambia!

Beautiful Zambia is a proudly Zambian owned blog website which is about highlighting the beautiful aspects of Zambia its people and tourists attractions.

Its also about sharing the best one can get if the visit Zambia from crafts fashion to even just sitting in the sun and having a good time. So escape the rat race and visit the beautiful Zambia.

Below are some of our favourite articles, or you can go to the blog page to see our most recent posts.

Featured articles Most recent articles

Featured articles

Here is a list of articles which I feel can give you a good idea of what this blog site is all about.

  • THIS IS ZAMBIA

    by Caroline N Muneku on 26 juin 2017

    Formerly called Northern Rhodesia as an integral part of Cecil Rhodes’ Cape to Cairo vision, Zambia is in fact steeped in history dating all the way back to the African Stone Age. However, in many ways the famous Scottish missionary David Livingstone put the country on the European map as he came to the shores of Lake Tanganyika in search of the source of the Nile in the early 19th century.
